error.rate_limit_exceeded: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
error.no_models: Cannot find supported models. Please check that your API token has 'Workers AI:Read' permissions.
error.no_accounts: No accounts found. Please check that your API token has 'Account:Read' permissions.
error.insufficient_permission_account: Insufficient permission to access the requested resource. Please check that your API token has 'Account:Read' permissions.
error.insufficient_permission_model: Insufficient permission to access the requested resource. Please check that your API token has 'Workers AI:Read' permissions.
error.insufficient_permission_ai_run: Insufficient permission to access the requested resource. Please check that your API token has 'Workers AI:Edit' permissions.

user.title: Cloudflare API Token
user.description: Enter your Cloudflare API token. This token must have permissions to list accounts, list AI models, and run AI completions. Recommended: Use a token with the 'Account:Read', 'Workers AI:Read', and 'Workers AI:Edit' permissions for your account. Instructions for creating a token are at https://developers.cloudflare.com/fundamentals/api/get-started/create-token/. The token will be validated before you can continue.

account.title: Select Cloudflare Account
account.description: Choose the Cloudflare account to use for AI completions.

model.title: Select Model
model.description: Pick a model to use. See supported models at https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers-ai/models/ and model pricing at https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers-ai/platform/pricing/.
